entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries mixed with drizzle early in the evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
